answers.answer: You go in and they get you to drink this sugary stuff. If I were you I wouldn't eat anything sweet right before because I did and then had to do the 8 hour fasting one. After the sugar stuff you can't eat or drink anything then in an hour you get bloodwork

If you have to throw up hold it as long as you can, at least in the last couple minutes! Lol it's not really nasty, it just didn't settle well in ny stomach and I threw it up 58minutes after drinking it, but they still took my blood.

You have to fast for 12 hours prior, You'll get blood drawn,  drink the glucose syrup, wait some time and get more blood drawn. Its a simple test.. just very long (and the syrup aren't great tasting) I had to drink it twice because the first time I couldn't keep it down.Best of luckPam and Holly
Also if you throw it up you can't redo it that day.
When in pregnancy do we get this ?

I got mine done. The lab technician gave me like five minutes to gulp it down! I saw a preggo lady do it in seconds took me just under five because I wasn't in the mood to drink/eat. It didn't taste bad just the wait is what made me nauseas. I threw it all up after my visit. Thank god lol. Good luck

title: what should i expect for the one hour gestational diabetes test
